name: Toggle
author: Daniel Buchner
description: A polyfill merging radiobutton/checkbox inputs into a single tag to provide a consistent UI and simplify markup. Automatically switches between radiobutton and checkbox depending on name attribute.

documentation.description: A polyfill merging radiobutton/checkbox inputs into a single tag to provide a consistent UI and simplify markup. Automatically switches between radiobutton and checkbox depending on name attribute.

attributes.no-box: If set, hides the polyfill's checkbox/radio button.
attributes.label: Contains the raw HTML string to render as the toggle's label.
attributes.name: Handles the name of the input. Follows the same rules as radio/checkbox input naming, and is required for form submissions to see the input. Multiple <x-toggle>s with the same name automatically become radio buttons.
attributes.value: Handles the input's value. Acts the same as any other <input> tag's value, and is submitted in forms.
attributes.group: Checkboxes with the same group can be range-toggled by holding down the shift key while toggling checkboxes
attributes.active: Indicates whether or not the toggle is the currently active toggle in of its group, if it has one.
attributes.checked: Indicates whether the toggle is checked or not

getters.groupToggles: Returns a list of all toggles sharing the same group
getters.noBox: Returns the value of the no-box attribute
getters.label: Returns the value of the label attribute
getters.name: Returns the value of the name attribute
getters.group: Returns the value of the group attribute
getters.active: Returns the value of the active attribute
getters.checked: Returns the value of the checked attribute

setters.noBox: Sets the value of the no-box attribute
setters.label: Sets the value of the label attribute
setters.name: Sets the value of the name attribute
setters.group: Sets the value of the group attribute
setters.active: Sets the value of the active attribute
setters.checked: Sets the value of the checked attribute
